sub_title: Project manager, Engineering project manager, Event manager, HR
summary:
Looking for the job in France or online.

MY ADVANTAGES:

IDEA'S GENERATOR
I am a creative person. I find solutions to almost any difficult situation. It is necessary to present the challenge and my brain begins to generate the most effective ideas and solutions (I am able to look at the situation extremely non-standardly and practically).  

ORGANIZER
At the same time, I have excellent organizational experience, which allows me not only to come up with ideas, but also to choose the optimal ones. 

I AM FAMILIAR WITH MANY AREAS AND SPECIALISTS
I am the creator of a creative laboratory in St. Petersburg that worked with a vast majority of specialists from the fields of: robotics, IT, design, optics, EEG, physics, chemistry, mathematics, various crafts. I was personally involved in the creation of many projects. Many of these specialists today are professionals in their fields and have emigrated from Russia, many are grateful to me and ready to take part remotely in new interesting projects as consultants.

INSPIRATION OF EMPLOYEES AND YOUNG PEOPLE
I love working with people and helping them to develop with me. I can easily find common language with everyone and unite, inspire. I believe that we all live for a reason and all life's trials have a meaning, I have a huge amount of personal experience, personal stories that inspire people to believe in themselves and in their way of life. 

I AM A QUICK LEARNER
I am a very quick learner and I develop my competencies in practice. I am not afraid of complicated, routine or unpredictable work. I am not afraid to ask questions and work my way up to a full understanding of the task area entrusted to me.

WORK STYLE
Workaholic. Extremely motivated to develop what I am working on. Can't go to bed until I'm sure I've organized everything perfectly. Constantly experimenting and improving my projects, making them as useful as possible. Effectively delegate and anticipate pitfalls, find solutions without waiting to encounter accumulated problems.
